#summary The morphia release process

= The morphia Release Process =


Please do these steps for any new release candidates and stable version of morphia:

  # Update 6 pom.xml files to .100; increment parent number
  # Update driver dependency to 2.10.x (to be confirmed)
  # Update release notes
  # Upload new download to Morphia Wiki
  # Upload to Maven Central
  # Release candidate will be announced on Morphia Wiki
  # Stable version to be officially announced on Morphia Wiki and [https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups#!forum/mongodb-announce mongodb-announce Google Group]
